<xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="item_nbt_logic_set" x="464" y="149"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">stabilized</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="block_inv_get_item_inslot"><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></value><value name="tagValue"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="-320" y="236"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">stupid mcreator
</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="spawn_xporb"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="xpamount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="block_inv_get_item_inslot" collapsed="true"><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Bacterium</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">// server-only&#10;        if (world.isClientSide()) return;&#10;        if (!(world instanceof ILevelExtension ext)) return;&#10;&#10;        IItemHandler handler = ext.getCapability(&#10;                Capabilities.ItemHandler.BLOCK,&#10;                BlockPos.containing(x, y, z),&#10;                null&#10;        );&#10;        if (handler == null) return;&#10;&#10;        int slots = handler.getSlots();&#10;&#10;        for (int slot = 0; slot < slots; slot++) {&#10;            ItemStack st = handler.getStackInSlot(slot);&#10;            if (st.isEmpty()) continue;&#10;&#10;            // only care about bacterium items&#10;            if (!(st.getItem() instanceof net.crizo.rtcextras.item.BacteriumItem)) continue;&#10;&#10;            // stabilize (your existing proc)&#10;            StabilizeBacteriaProcedure.execute(world, x, y, z);&#10;&#10;            // if this bacterium shouldn't live, stop here&#10;            if (!BacteriumShouldLiveProcedure.execute(world, st)) {&#10;                return;&#10;            }&#10;        }</field><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">// do stuff here!!! like generating loot from RTC or whatever</field></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block><block type="call_procedure" x="476" y="270"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="procedure">StabilizeBacteria</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="java_code_get"><field name="CODE">BacteriumShouldLiveProcedure.execute()</field></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="text_print"><value name="TEXT"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">yes</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block><block type="text_print" x="523" y="503"><value name="TEXT"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">i guess we won the war</field></block></value></block><block type="return_logic" x="540" y="596"></block></xml>
